Key Match Events: LaMelo Ball scored 34 points, had 8 rebounds, and 11 assists in the comeback win
The Hornets came back from an 18-point deficit in the second half
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball expressed happiness about securing coach Charles Lee's first win
Charles Lee described LaMelo Ball as the 'engine' for the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets have won their last four season debut games, the longest active streak in the NBA
Others: The Hornets will play the Atlanta Hawks on Friday before returning home to play the Miami Heat
